title: Riot should try out Nemesis URF sometime
body: Nemesis URF would provide some wider champion picks than normal URF while being more likely to have balanced teams.  Of course, this mode would also need bans so the most boring picks can at least be shelved.

replies.body: This would be the same problem only instead of everyone picking the best champions, they'd always be giving each other the worst champions. And then you still have people hating the game mode because Riot took away the choice to pick the champ you want.
The bans would at least keep the most boring champions out of it.  Also, with everyone getting terrible champions, it'll likely turn into more of a brawl than now.
